edu.rit.numeric

Class Mathe

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.numeric.Mathe

  • public class Mathe
extends Object
    Class Mathe provides static methods for various mathematical functions. The class name is "Mathe" to distinguish it from class java.lang.Math.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double betai(double a, double b, double x)
      Returns the incomplete beta function Ix(a,b).
      static double erf(double x)
      Returns the error function erf(x).
      static double erfc(double x)
      Returns the complementary error function erfc(x).
      static double gammp(double a, double x)
      Returns the incomplete gamma function, P(a,x).
      static double gammq(double a, double x)
      Returns the complementary incomplete gamma function Q(a,x) = 1 − P(a,x).
      static double log2(double x)
      Returns the base-2 logarithm of x, log2 x.
      static double logChoose(long n, long k)
      Returns the natural logarithm of the binomial coefficient, log choose(n,k).
      static double logFactorial(long n)
      Returns the natural logarithm of the factorial function, log n!.
      static double logGamma(double x)
      Returns the natural logarithm of the gamma function, log Γ(x).
      static void main(String[] args)
      Unit test main program.
      static double sqr(double x)
      Returns x2.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • sqr

        public static double sqr(double x)
        Returns x2.

      • log2

        public static double log2(double x)
        Returns the base-2 logarithm of x, log2 x.

      • logGamma

        public static double logGamma(double x)
        Returns the natural logarithm of the gamma function, log Γ(x). If x is an integer, then Γ(x+1) = x!.

      • logFactorial

        public static double logFactorial(long n)
        Returns the natural logarithm of the factorial function, log n!.

      • logChoose

        public static double logChoose(long n,
               long k)
        Returns the natural logarithm of the binomial coefficient, log choose(n,k). choose(n,k) = n!/k!/(n−k)!.

      • gammp

        public static double gammp(double a,
           double x)
        Returns the incomplete gamma function, P(a,x).

      • gammq

        public static double gammq(double a,
           double x)
        Returns the complementary incomplete gamma function Q(a,x) = 1 − P(a,x).

      • erf

        public static double erf(double x)
        Returns the error function erf(x).

      • erfc

        public static double erfc(double x)
        Returns the complementary error function erfc(x).

      • betai

        public static double betai(double a,
           double b,
           double x)
        Returns the incomplete beta function Ix(a,b).

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        Unit test main program.
